histogram.name: Companion.CQ.TextHighlight.Success
histogram.summary: Records whether a text highlight operation was successful on the companion page. Recorded after text highlighting is completed.

histogram.name: Companion.HasNavigatedToExpsSuccessPagePref.OnChanged
histogram.summary: Records value of the Exps Policy Pref. That pref contains boolean on whether companion featureobserved successful exps registration. Recorded after the value of pref has changed.

histogram.name: Companion.HasNavigatedToExpsSuccessPagePref.Status
histogram.summary: Records value of the Exps Policy Pref. Recorded when the pref is read.

histogram.name: Companion.IsUserOptedInToExps
histogram.summary: Records whether user is opted-in to various experiments. Recorded when the information is received from the companion backend.

histogram.name: Companion.PromoEvent
histogram.summary: Records various events (e.g. displayed, accepted or rejected) on various promo surfaces on the companion page. Recorded as soon as the event happens.

histogram.name: Companion.SidePanel.OpenTrigger
histogram.summary: Records the UI location from which the companion side panel was triggered to be opened. Recorded after the companion is opened and loaded.

histogram.name: Companion.SidePanelAvailabilityChanged
histogram.summary: Records change in availability of the Companion side panel based on finch and runtime checks. Recorded everytime the availability computation is run.

histogram.name: Companion.{UiSurface}.ChildElementCount
histogram.summary: Records the number of child elements shown within the UI surface. Only valid for list UI surfaces. Recorded as soon as the surface is shown.

histogram.name: Companion.{UiSurface}.Clicked
histogram.summary: Records whether {UiSurface} was clicked by the user on the companion page. Recorded as soon as the surface is clicked.

histogram.name: Companion.{UiSurface}.ClickPosition
histogram.summary: Records the position of the UI element that was clicked with respect to its parent list. Recorded as soon as the surface is clicked.

histogram.name: Companion.{UiSurface}.Shown
histogram.summary: Records whether {UiSurface} was shown on the companion page. Recorded as soon as the surface is shown.
